portfolioDescription: VBreathe PRO™X is the world’s most advanced Air Sanitisation and Purification Solution
detailDescription1: With patented dual-protection technology that delivers both in-air and on-surface sanitisation, as well as its advanced HEPA filtration, VBreathe PRO™X is the world’s most advanced Air Sanitisation and Purification Solution. VBreathe PRO™X can remove pathogens, including viruses, bacteria, mould, and allergens up to 99.97% efficacy.
features: Global control and communication with VBreathe PRO™X via Internet of Things technology
Real-time updates on your air quality
Switch control seamlessly among multiple VBreathe PRO™X
View interactive graphs and see how your air quality improves over time
Timely update on when to change your VBreathe PRO™X  filter and gel
Receive alerts about your air quality when away
Share VBreathe PRO™X control securely with other users while maintaining ownership

portfolioDescription: A team of coffee lovers who always strive for perfection in the art of making coffee

detailDescription2: Everything is fresh and made to order.
